string-array.name: error_information
string-array.item: : Client is not connected. Check your network connection and verify if the client is up and running.\n\n
: Server is not connected. Check your network connection and verify if the Remote address and Remote port are correct.\n\n
: Port number #argument# specified in the mask is used by another application. Change the port number and deploy the model again.\n\n
: Cannot resolve the host name #argument# to IP address. Change the Remote address block parameter and deploy the model again.\n\n
: Server could not be created. Restart the app.\n\n
: Client could not be created. Restart the app.\n\n
